column4: I have an external USB drive that is automatically set to read-only when I mount it using the following command:  sudo mount -t ntfs -rw /dev/sdb1 /media/LaCie   The output of this command is:  mount: warning: /media/LaCie seems to be mounted read-only.  Any suggestions?
take a look at dmesg, about the last 100 lines.
nopaste the output of lsb_release -a please
